blogPost.excerpt: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
blogPost.body: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
blogPost.title: PowerFarm - Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.
blogPost.author: Wojtek Smajda

localize.description: PowerFarm平台可以让您在云端运行和协调Selenium和移动测试。它可以快速、彻底地监控结果，并确保与存储库或其他平台顺利集成。通过加入我们的早期访问计划了解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在云端协调和管理您的测试。

localize.description: PowerFarm平臺可以讓您在雲端運行和協調Selenium和移動測試。它可以快速、徹底地監控結果，並確保與存儲庫或其他平臺順利集成。通過加入我們的早期訪問計劃瞭解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在雲端協調和管理您的測試。

previous.title:
The sell-off in high momentum stocks over the past few weeks is more than 3x larger than the broad market.

This is the sharpest momentum downturn on a relative basis that we've seen in quite some time.

$MTUM $SPY

Charting via @ycharts https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j

localize.full_text:
过去几周高动量股的抛售幅度是大盘的3倍多。

这是我们在相当长一段时间内看到的相对基础上最剧烈的动量下跌。

$MTUM $SPY

通过@ycharts绘制图表 https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j

過去幾周高動量股的拋售幅度是大盤的3倍多。

這是我們在相當長一段時間內看到的相對基礎上最劇烈的動量下跌。

$MTUM $SPY

通過@ycharts繪製圖表 https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j

next.title:
Have now launched Occasio Capital Ltd as an independent research firm, seeking to publish jargon-free equity research for retail investors. (See banner image)

This stands as a holding company for everything I do under Investment Talk, as well as a few other things. https://t.co/apyTX61SP9

localize.full_text:
现已成立Occasio Capital Ltd，作为一家独立的研究公司，力求为散户投资者提供无行话的股票研究。(见横幅图片)

这代表着我在投资话术下所做的一切，以及其他一些事情的控股公司。https://t.co/apyTX61SP9。

現已成立Occasio Capital Ltd，作爲一家獨立的研究公司，力求爲散戶投資者提供無行話的股票研究。(見橫幅圖片)

這代表着我在投資話術下所做的一切，以及其他一些事情的控股公司。https://t.co/apyTX61SP9。
